SystemPage.cacheErrorDesc: Unable to load system cache data, some features may be affected.

APIInterfacesPage.title: {systemName} - API Interfaces
APIInterfacesPage.subtitle: This page displays the API interfaces exposed by the system {systemName}.
APIInterfacesPage.selectSystemPrompt: Please select a system from the left to view its API interfaces.
APIInterfacesPage.noInterfaces: This system has no defined API interfaces.
APIInterfacesPage.docUnavailable: This API interface does not have an associated valid Swagger document.
APIInterfacesPage.docInvalidFormat: Swagger document content is invalid or incorrectly formatted: {error}
APIInterfacesPage.invalidDocFormat: The document content does not conform to the OpenAPI specification.

SystemArchitecturePage.title: System Architecture
SystemArchitecturePage.subtitle: This shows the overall system architecture, application architecture, and deployment architecture of the product.
SystemArchitecturePage.confirmSwitch: Switching tabs will lose unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to continue?
SystemArchitecturePage.addDesc: There is no architecture diagram yet. Click the button below to start creating. We provide templates to help you get started quickly.

RequirementTemplatePage.title: Requirement Template
RequirementTemplatePage.subtitle: Create and edit requirement document templates for consistency across your projects.

BoundaryPage.title: Boundary Identification Knowledge
BoundaryPage.subtitle: This page displays boundary identification rules and examples to help you better perform requirements analysis.

BoundaryRules.title: Boundary Identification Rules
BoundaryRules.deleteSuccessDesc: Boundary identification rule has been deleted
BoundaryRules.resetSuccessDesc: Boundary identification rules have been reset to defaults
BoundaryRules.updateSuccessDesc: Boundary identification rule has been updated
BoundaryRules.addSuccessDesc: New boundary identification rule has been added
BoundaryRules.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset the rules?
BoundaryRules.resetConfirmDesc: This will delete all custom rules and restore default rules. This action cannot be undone.

GlossaryPage.title: Glossary Management
GlossaryPage.subtitle: Manage and define standardized terms used across your projects.
GlossaryPage.termNameExplanationRequired: Term name and explanation are required
GlossaryPage.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this term?
GlossaryPage.selectAtLeastOneTerm: Please select at least one term
GlossaryPage.configNotFound: Default vector model configuration not found, please set a default configuration in settings
GlossaryPage.configIncomplete: Vector model configuration is incomplete, please check baseURL, apiKey and model
GlossaryPage.confirmApprove: Are you sure you want to approve the selected {count} terms? This will generate vector embeddings for them, which may take some time.
GlossaryPage.editApprovedWarning: Editing an approved term will change its status to pending and clear its vector embedding. It will need to be approved again.

InformationArchitecture.title: Product Information Architecture
InformationArchitecture.subtitle: View and manage the product's information architecture, user personas, and related information.
InformationArchitecture.selectSystemDesc: You need to select a system to view product information
InformationArchitecture.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item? All child items will be deleted as well.
InformationArchitecture.name: Name
InformationArchitecture.clickAddButton: Click the add button to create one
InformationArchitecture.importFormatError: Import format error. Please check the JSON format

TemplateCenter.title: Template Center
TemplateCenter.subtitle: Manage and use reusable template content
TemplateCenter.noTemplates: No templates yet, click the "Create Template" button to create your first template
TemplateCenter.name: Name
TemplateCenter.contentPlaceholder: Enter template content, supports Markdown format
TemplateCenter.requiredFields: Name and content are required fields
TemplateCenter.createFailedDesc: Failed to create template, please try again later
TemplateCenter.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this template? This action cannot be undone.
TemplateCenter.notFoundDesc: This template may have been deleted
TemplateCenter.fetchDetailFailedDesc: Failed to fetch template details, please try again later

StandardCenter.title: Standard Center
StandardCenter.subtitle: Manage and use standardized content
StandardCenter.noStandards: No standards yet, click the "Create Standard" button to create your first standard
StandardCenter.name: Name
StandardCenter.contentPlaceholder: Enter standard content, supports Markdown format
StandardCenter.requiredFields: Name and content are required fields
StandardCenter.createFailedDesc: Failed to create standard, please try again later
StandardCenter.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this standard? This action cannot be undone.
StandardCenter.notFoundDesc: This standard may have been deleted
StandardCenter.fetchDetailFailedDesc: Failed to fetch standard details, please try again later
